## Description 

You are a mage, Mage! And you have been hired by the 72Co Train Company to load cargo onto train! However, budget is tight and we can not afford to waste time stopping at the train station waiting for you to load the train.

Use your spells to push, pull, and fly cargo onto fast moving train, while managing your mana reserve and being careful of the magical nature of the world!

## Instructions & Gameplay 

Play with Mouse and Keyboard

WASD / Arrow Keys

1234 keys

Move mouse

There is 4 spells in the game:

- The Meditation: replenish mana by clicking on bubble floating on the screen

- The Force Push: push the nearest cargo from the mouse pointer in the direction indicated by the WASD/Arrow key press

- The Vortex: move the mouse around to create a vortex and pull everything towards it

- The Wolrd Impact: change the world gravity (with up/down or W/S) and tilt the world (with left/right or A/D) to combat random events.

## Programs 

Unity 2020.3 / Aseprite <3 / Visual Studio 2019 Community  / Audacity
